email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

We need to transport 8500MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms. Can you provide a vessel option and a freight quote? Laycan preferred between 25-30 September.

Best regards,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Thanks for your inquiry. I can offer the MV OCEAN HORIZON, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m. The starting freight rate is USD 85 per MT. Laycan 25-30 September is feasible. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

USD 85 seems a bit high given the current market. Can you revise the rate? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Considering your feedback, I can adjust the rate to USD 80 per MT. Demurrage is USD 14,000 per day, pro rata. Loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

USD 80 sounds reasonable. Can we lock in the MV OCEAN HORIZON with a laycan of 25-30 September? Please send over the charter party for review.

Thanks,
Carlos

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Carlos,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best,
Linda

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for MV OCEAN HORIZON
email_chain.body:
Hi Linda,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best,
Carlos
